Class LibrarySearch

java.lang.Object
  LibrarySearch

public class LibrarySearch
extends java.lang.Object

The LibrarySearch class organizes book and journal records into a modifiable and viewable database.

Author:
Julian Di Leonardo

public static java.util.ArrayList<Reference> hashMapSearch(java.lang.String[] titleArray,
                                                           java.util.ArrayList<Reference> ReferenceDB)
Searches through the hashmap using the search title and comapring it to entires in the hashmap of titles, returning a simplified ReferenceDB

Parameters:

ReferenceDB - DB that will be simplified
Returns:
